Brazil:
The first Rio Carnival happens to celebrate Dom João IV's coronation as king of Portugal.
Guaraní forces living in the Jesuit reductions defeat bandeirantes loyal to the Portuguese Empire at the Battle of Mbororé in present-day Panambí, Argentina.
Chile: The first Parliament of Quillín is held. The first large shipment of Fitzroya wood leaves Chiloé Archipelago.
Ireland: Irish Rebellion of 1641: Phelim O'Neill leads the capture of several forts in the north of Ireland.
Singapore: Fall of Portuguese Malacca to Dutch.
Taiwan: The Dutch attempt to oust the Spaniards from Keelung but fail
